list.description:
СИЛЬНЫЙ прицел от СИЛЬНОГО стримера https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKJlgXG9Lc9jtr1IM97ANDA.
Прицел STRONG_sight отлично подойдет сторонникам минимализма, которые играют на машинах со слабой и средней кратностью прицела.
Файл из папки распаковать в WarThunder\UserSights\all_tanks
Если ее еще нет, в корневой папке WarThunder создать папку UserSights, потом all_tanks и в нее распаковать прицел

STRONG sight from STRONG streamer https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKJlgXG9Lc9jtr1IM97ANDA.
The STRONG_sight sight is perfect for minimalists who play on machines with low to medium magnification....

Peter Griffin waiting for you to shoot him. (Improves post pen damage by 15%)

#meme #art #sight #petergriffin #familyguy

All vehicles can be used，But it cannot be put in all_tanks。

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\us_m1a1_abrams


所有地面载具都可以使用这些瞄具，但不要把文件放入all_tanks文件夹中。

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\us_m1a1_abrams

简介 : 我准备做多种系列瞄具，这是第一批，推荐给顶级与次顶级坦克使用的，所以弹道尺刻度只有1000米 2000米 3000米 其余刻度全部省略。
为了做出区分，我不准备让这些瞄具可以放到all_tanks文件夹中。

#m1_abrams

M1 /IPM1 / M1A1/A2/HC/SEP........Sight
Zoom : 3.0x - 10.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\us_m1_abrams

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\us_m1_abrams

#m18_hellcat

M18_Hellcat Sight
Zoom :1.9x - 3.5x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_m18_hellcat

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_m18_hellcat

#zsd63_pg87

ZSD63/PG87 Sight
Zoom : 1.5x - 6.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_zsd63_pg87

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_zsd63_pg87

#lavad

LavAD Sight
Zoom : 8.0x - 12.0x
【2023-11-1 更新为 4.0x-12.0x （已修复）】

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\us_lav_ad

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\us_lav_ad

I don't know what to say really. It's just a simple sight I made because I couldn't find any like it. This time, I found out how to offset the range markings - so you can see the target better with high-velocity ammunition. Sight illumination has been changed to orange for better viewability.

Instructions:
Just put it into \War Thunder\UserSights\all_tanks and go from there

Tags:
#alltanks #all_tanks #all #universal #sight #scope #crosshair #custom
#american #german #russian #soviet #ussr #british #japanese #chinese #italian #french #swedish #isralian #sweden

UPDATED!

Very simple sight usable with all tanks, but primarily made for APFSDS and APDS rounds. I got tired of not seeing my target and it's weakspots because of the sight lines while using the rangefinder or aiming above the target, so I offset them. Works with rangefinder. And just for convenience, I set the distance markers to 250 meters, with every thousand written out with a number. Works great with APHE and HE as well!

Install: navigate to your main WT install directory and place the .blk file into your UserSights -> all_tanks folder. Create the folders if you don't have them alre...

Rework of my universal sights
Install guide : unpack in War Thunder\UserSights\all_tanks folder (if the folder does not exist, create)//

first sight link https://live.warthunder.com/post/1075762
second sight link https://live.warthunder.com/post/1078512

Sight for ALL(almost) Shermans with 75mm gun in game, including NON-shermans with m3 gun//
!!NOT REALISTIC, BUT COMFY FOR AVERAGE PLAYER!!//
Install guide : unpack in War Thunder\UserSights folder (if the folder does not exist, create)//
(If there is no sight for your Sherman, then there is a separate file with a sight in the archive, put it into the folder with your Sherman)//
And now time for a HUUUUGE amount of HASHTAGS//
#m4 #m4_sherman #m4a1 #m4a1_sherman #m4a2 #m4a2_sherman #m4a4 #m4a4...

My personal sight is adjusted so that the rangefinder distances are directly on the sight and on opposite sides for better orientation. The measured distance is closer to the sight and the set distance is also closer to the sight. The reticle lighting has been changed to yellow for better visibility than red. The sight works on all tanks.
